Docs.summary: The namespace contains classes that control and provide functionality for proxies. A proxy is a local object that is an image of a remote object. Proxies enable clients to access objects across remoting boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks One of the most important classes of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies> namespace is the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy> class, which provides the base functionality for all remoting proxies, and can be used to create custom proxies.
